title: Install a WD Hard Drive in Your Desktop
description:
Upgrading your desktop computer with additional storage is easier than you think.

If you find yourself needing more storage space on your computer, it's surprisingly simple to add an additional hard drive to increase your computer's capacity.

Just follow these easy steps on how to install a WD Caviar Blue, Caviar Green or Carviar Black internal hard drive in your desktop.

Brought to you by Western Digital - www.wdc.com.
